about_the_game:
Take me to your leader! Prepare for the Invasion of the Brain Eaters, a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

They know neuron to them.



Invasion of the Brain Eaters DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items to synapse up. They’re out of this world and ready to make waves, brain waves.
Can you keep a lid on it when you wear the Brain Eater Mask? Space out on the Distant Planet. Make up your mind with the Brain Eater Emblem and show off your Braaaains with a brand new voice line.

Is there anybody out there?



This pack includes 4 new items:

Brain Eater Mask


Get piece of mind with an Exclusive Premium Mask of the Brain Eater

Distant Planet


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Distant Planet because you rock

Braaaains!

An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line because Braaaains!

Brain Eater Emblem

An Exclusive Brain Eater Emblem Player Icon because you are extra terrestrial.

short_description: Take me to your leader! Prepare for the Invasion of the Brain Eaters, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!
